info.title: History of The United States of America
info.details: This timeline displays a very condensed list of the major events in American history.

events.headline: Colonies declare independence from Great Britain
events.description: Colonies declare independence from Great Britain

events.headline: The Civil War begins
events.description: The North and South fight the Civil War over slavery and other issues.

events.headline: The Wall Street stock market crashes
events.description: The Wall Street stock market crashes. Fortunes are lost, and the Great Depression begins.

events.headline: Japan bombs the U.S. fleet at Pearl Harbor
events.description: Japan bombs the U.S. fleet at Pearl Harbor, in Hawaii. The U.S. enters World War II. The war lasts until 1945.

events.headline: Martin Luther King Jr. delivers his 'I Have a Dream' speech
events.description: Martin Luther King Jr. delivers his 'I Have a Dream' speech in Washington D.C., leading the civil rights movement.

events.headline: One Giant Leap For Mankind
events.description: Astronaut Neil Armstrong becomes the first person to walk on the moon.
